Room_1.name: Village Hut
Room_1.description: You wake up in a small, dilapidated hut in the village. The air is filled with tension, and distant oinks can be heard from outside.
Room_1.obj_description: There's an unlit torchlight on the ground beside you.

Room_2.name: Abandoned Laboratory
Room_2.description: You enter a rundown laboratory filled with broken equipment and remnants of failed experiments. The stench of chemicals lingers in the air.
Room_2.obj_description: You see a plaster cast that seems significant.

Room_3.name: Ancient Temple
Room_3.description: You stumble upon an ancient temple shrouded in mystery. The air is thick with an otherworldly presence, and the walls are adorned with enigmatic symbols.
Room_3.obj_description: You see a communicator that seems significant.

Room_4.name: Hidden Crypt
Room_4.description: You discover a hidden crypt, that may open, deep within the underground tunnels. The walls are covered in cryptic engravings, and rows of ancient coffins line the chamber.
Room_4.obj_description: There is a laser shield glowing on the far wall.

Room_5.name: Resistance Hideout
Room_5.description: You find yourself in the secret hideout of the resistance group. The room is bustling with activity, and brave fighters gather to strategize and prepare for battle.
Room_5.obj_description: There are blueprints on the ground.

Room_6.name: Reactor Tunnels
Room_6.description: Navigating through dark and eerie tunnels, you approach the reactor. The air is heavy with radiation, and the sound of machinery echoes in the distance.
Room_6.obj_description: There is a power cell in the corner of the room.

Room_7.name: Torture Chamber
Room_7.description: You enter a gruesome torture chamber where captured villagers endure unspeakable horrors. The room is filled with ominous devices and the agonizing cries of the tormented.
Room_7.obj_description: There is a plasma cutter on the ground.

Room_8.name: Pig Mutant Stronghold
Room_8.description: You stand before the fortified stronghold of the Pig Mutant King. The area is heavily guarded, and tortured cries of captured resistance members fill the air.
Room_8.obj_description: There is a crumpled letter on the ground.

Room_9.name: Throne Room
Room_9.description: You enter the opulent throne room where the Pig Mutant King resides. The King sits atop a grand throne, emanating power and malice.
Room_9.obj_description: Next to the desk there is a mutagen sample.

Room_10.name: Victory Celebration
Room_10.description: The battle is won! You join the celebration with your fellow resistance fighters. The once-doomed Porktopia is now on its way to rebuilding and restoring peace.
Room_10.obj_description: You see a crown on the ground. Claim it, it's yours!
